object_name.value: Validate document has at least one Document Coordinator defined

title.value: Ensures a Document Coordinator is available when initiating a review / approval workflow

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
At least one Document Coordinator must be defined for ''$value(object_name)'' before using this function.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where not exists (select * from cd_controlled_doc(all) where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)' and any doc_coordinators is not null)
